website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight yet durable inflatable pouf just needs inflating when you want to use it and takes up little space when packed away.
pros: Available in a wide range of patterns
Resists fading for at least 500 hrs

customer_reviews.title: Order in darker colors so you don’t have to wash it as often.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman, it is the perfect size for my needs, and looks cute on my patio. I would order it in a darker color next time however, because I can see already that I will have to wash the cover often from my dogs sitting on it lol. It was easy to inflate, and very lightweight so you can move it around easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great, i thought i would buy it and fill it with the “beans” but i love it. Don’t inflate all the way it’s much more comfy. Also don’t inflate until you put the cover on
customer_reviews.author: Nikflor

customer_reviews.title: Good & portable for elevating feet in small areas
customer_reviews.text: Portable, be sure you have a pump, color was brighter than picture.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Love this purchase! Been needing a decorative pouf for my backyard and didn’t want to spend $60-$80 for one. Mainly because they’re not useful – just decorative. So when I saw this I knew I had to have it. Definitely will be buying more for my backyard. Takes a little bit to blow up, but not that big of a deal. Easily sturdy enough to put your feet on or even put a tray on to decorate. Very well-made!
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Guys. This product is amazing. Forgive the crazy picture of my friend lol classic balcony hangout, BUT I wanted to show how perfect these ottomans are for resting your feet. When I first was looking to buy this product I was like “omg idk they seem kind of short” but no. They are perfect. And look at the pattern! They are easy to clean and so sturdy and beautiful. Inflating these was kind of intense because I had to use my mouth because I don’t have a pump. So, yes I was a bit light headed BUT my excitement of the finished, inflated product trumped all of my dizziness. Just buy it! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: great colors
customer_reviews.text: these cime in some great colors. do yourself a favor and partially inflate before putting in fabric cover. this allows you to be able to get in in... and have it positioned the the inflate deflate valve is near the opening. then finish blowing it up. Not sure it will hold the weight it says but it is a wonderful footstool.
customer_reviews.author: MARK W VAN TILBURG

customer_reviews.title: Great little ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I am pleasantly surprised by the quality of this little ottoman. While it is a bit lower to the ground than what I wanted (2 inches higher would have made it perfect)- there is absolutely nothing wrong with the product itself. The fabric is a high quality outdoor fabric, that should hold up well over time. I do suggest you blow it up half way and then insert it in the cover - then finish inflating.
customer_reviews.author: KMBS

customer_reviews.title: Love these ottomans!
customer_reviews.text: We are campers and boaters, so space is always a concern for us. This ottoman blows up quickly when you need it and deflates when you want to put it away. BTW - the fabric is nicer than I thought it would be. I actually have 3 of them. That is how much I like them!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ottoman however it is very light I bought 4 but they blow around on a windy day will need to place something inside to add weight. Comfortable to sit and good as a table as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable footstool but went flat, and cannot find leak.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have had this for hardly a year and it has gone flat. I have tried to find where the leak is without success. It's too bad...I really like the look of it, and when it did stay inflated it was a very comfortable foot stool to go with my adirondack chairs in my courtdyard. I don't have animals or children at home so I don't have any idea what may have caused a leak. I have reinflated it twice now and each time it flattens out after several days. The fabric is nice heavy quality, but it will fade from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: JDoyle

customer_reviews.title: This thing is SO awesome. Easy to inflate and deflate/store
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO awesome. Easy to inflate and deflate/store. It looks great and functions well. I would use a pump if you have one, that way it will blow up nice and firm. You don't need it but I found I couldn't get it all the way full with just my lungs. Maybe I need to run more so my lungs are stronger. But who am I kidding, I'm buying a foot stool so I can put my feet up...not run. HA. Very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Slow leak at first
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't going to complain but it continues to bother me that we have spent hours trying to repair the ottoman that just will not hold air. Bought 2 and this one seems too far gone. The cover is fine and I like how light weight thy are. we have blown it up at about once a week starting a few weeks after arrival. We are both are retired so no kids around and they are just used for few hours at night. We both like to have our own to put our tired old feet up:) Please consider replacing it so I can change the review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: I eliminated the inflatable piece and took the fabric to an upholster and filled it up with a sturdy foam.
customer_reviews.text: The most; price, colors & prints. The least; it is very unstable (wobbly) you can not sit on it without being thrown to the sides. I eliminated the inflatable piece and took the fabric to an upholster and filled it up with a sturdy foam.
customer_reviews.author: John Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable outdoor ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my balcony lounge setup. Make sure you insert the inflatable part inside the cover before inflating. For ease, keep the inflation knob closest to the end of the zipper. As you begin to inflate, start zipping up the cover leaving just a few inches before fully zipped. This way, it'll be easy to fully close when inflated. It can be hard to zip up if you inflate to a firm amount. I blew it up manually easily. Just remember to pinch the bottom of the knob a bit to allow air to flow in and out. Took me a bit to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think so before I bought it but 9” height is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, this was an instant hit with my little friend! Fabric is fantastic! A snap to inflate and zip into cover. No regrets here!! Decided to tie the handle to the base of my chair when I’m not using it on a windy day. Don’t want to chase it! Love it already.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA HOPE

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is attractive, light weight and the price was reasonable. It was easy to inflate with a standard air pump. My daughter ordered one that came with a pump that was useless. Mine did not come with a pump but I had been warned to use a standard air pump. It is very lightweight in fact it was blown around on my balcony on a very windy day. The handle on the side makes carrying it very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, ordered two more. The fabric is very nice and sturdy especially for outdoors. The inflatable part appears to be good quality. How to : Place inflatable inside of cover before inflating it. Do not inflate to full capacity or it will look like an inflatable and will not rest in a nice flat position. Far nicer than I imagined. They look great flanking my outdoor rattan sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Cali g

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ottomans
customer_reviews.text: I really love these ottomans, and the pattern matches my outdoor decor perfectly. However, I had to put sand in ziplock bags and put them on the bottom before inserting the blowup piece so they wouldn't blow away outside.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Calabrese

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute with my little lime green outdoor table
customer_reviews.text: This being inflatable makes it portable and lightweight but it sits a little low for an ottoman and would blow away pretty easily off a deck. We have it in a contained underdeck area when using it so it's probably safe there. It's okay; probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mari-Ann Wise

customer_reviews.title: Stitching comes apart very easy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the print but the stitching comes apart within two uses. Blowing it up is simple but do not inflate too much because you won’t be able to fit it inside the fabric and if you try to zip it the stitching comes apart. $20 isn’t bad but I’d rather pay 10-12 for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Master-Parker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is a fantastic value, the inflatable part is separate from the cover so washing will be a breeze and if the inflatable ever breaks it’s great to know that you can fill with foam peanuts or poly fill. The fabric feels like a very good quality outdoor fabric and it looks great with my patio set from Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: Lpo

customer_reviews.title: Clearly used and damaged with patches
customer_reviews.text: How is this brand new and it has 3 patches in the vinyl?! I am so angry at this blatant misrepresentation!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect ottoman for my deck! It's lightweight but sturdy and it's a lot bigger than I expected. I'm very happy with this purchase. This ottoman did not come with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: SeeMissDee

customer_reviews.title: Thought I settled, but I actually hit the jackpot.
customer_reviews.text: Dude—listen...these things are OUTSTANDING. I spent far too much time researching poufs and was floored to see the price of most. I thought I’d “settle” on these, however they’re actually ELITE. Durable, stylish, lightweight and versatile—they’re my everything. At first glance I thought they were cheap. On second glance I want them in my life forever. You’ll obsess over inflating them entirely and then realize there’s a nice sweet spot below full inflation that optimizes your comfort. Don’t fret over max inflation. Go with the flow. Also, inflate a bit and then put on the cover and then continue inflating. Trust me on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cerenzia

customer_reviews.title: Sort of addicted
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly nice little pouf for the price. The fabric is very sturdy, it’s a nice size (I know my “I’m so excited” photo sitting on the couch gives no size reference), and very comfy. Best of all- for condo dwellers, at the end of the summer I can deflate it, wash the cover, and keep it in a drawer. Folds to about a pillowcase size.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany J

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Such a stylist little ottoman! I was hesitant of an inflatable ottoman but I absolutely love this! I wish I had bought 2! Very sturdy and the the fabric cover is very thick and waterproof. The zipper is high quality too.
customer_reviews.author: j Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Great price, prefect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outside. (Unless you do something silly like put it by the fire and an ember lands on it.) It was a small burn, easily repaired. Got it for the price, very glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: ksue@gmail

customer_reviews.title: Friends are raving!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for myself and guests to put their feet up when using our backyard rattan set. I also didn't want to spend a ton on money or need to store another bulky item. These inflatable ones are the best! They are large, easy to inflate and I love the pattern and colors. Nice to be able to take them off to be washed as well. Plus you can bring it places and stores easily. I bought three and everyone that uses it, asks where to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T "HOLD UP"!
customer_reviews.text: I missed the return "window"! I ordered 3 different ones and 1 doesn't hold the air! Very disappointed! 😖😥
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Faded after a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first got it. Have had it for a year now and the orange has faded a lot. Never had it in direct sunlight. Stored in a shed over winter. Stayed blown up and is sturdy to sit on. Unfortunately it doesn't go with the orange pillows anymore due to the fading. Wouldn't purchase again because of that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors, easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters' fort that we built them for Christmas. I wanted weather proof seating that was easy to move around, but would still be cute & functional. These are perfect for the space!
customer_reviews.author: P.P.

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor ease
customer_reviews.text: It comes flat shipped. All you need to do is open it, inflate the inside piece, and then zip it in the beautiful cover. Its easy to do, looks great, super light weight. We have it in a screen house. We've used it as a shared ottoman, as well as a seat.
customer_reviews.author: CindyNY&FL

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece - vibrant, lightweight and a great add to our patio for a foot stool or extra seat. That said, It keeps deflating.
customer_reviews.author: pinellas71

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this foot rest but didn’t come with a pump so it was so hard to inflate. Then it was even more difficult to get it into the seat cover. Disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mailee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backyard addition
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my patio! Very light and easy to move and bright vivid colors! I have the multi color paisley one
customer_reviews.author: Bellabet12

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these. Both lost air/had hole within one month. Got replacements which did the same. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: KM2000

customer_reviews.title: This was a pretty cool foot rest
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty cool foot rest. My friend was even able to sit on it. You can't fill it all the way and zipper it up so u need to go slow and take your time😀
customer_reviews.author: Sweets

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these.. I've bought 2 only because my cats like to sharpen their claws on it. I have to keep putting air in them until it doesn't hold air any longer; then I buy a new one. I can reuse the covers, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to blow up (do it inside the casing) bc it’s impossible to squeeze it in after it’s blown up.
customer_reviews.author: Trapper

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pattern
customer_reviews.text: We really like the ottomans however we were sent the wrong pattern. We had ordered the leaf pattern but were sent the turquoise chevron pattern. We are keeping them because they match our decor well enough, but it was a little odd. Especially since the receipt said the leaf ones were in the box. I've included a picture of the ones we actually received. I do think they are cute and easy to move around. They will be great for camping and music festivals too.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie May

customer_reviews.title: The recipient likes it and thinks the pattern is great. Difficult to inflate and get cover straight
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift. The recipient likes it and thinks the pattern is great. Difficult to inflate and get cover straight. Need to insert inflatable into cover before fully inflating the insert.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome idea!
customer_reviews.text: So easy and how awesome that it is inflatable. What a cute pattern and the fabric has held up to my cat climbing up onto it with his nails and my puppy's claws. The material is very heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: CassieSz89

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Colors as pictured, comfort is better than expected based on price, perfect height for using with Adirondack chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer81

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot rest! I used an air up mattress pump to fill it up which worked great, you definitely can’t air it up by mouth in less than an hour lol. Looks so cute!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this poof. It's made well and has really done great on our camping adventures. The cover is sturdy and made well, easy to put on. The cushion itself is a little difficult to inflate, but that could just be my compressor attachment. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow up ottoman! I looked all over for a wicker outdoor ottoman to use with my outdoor rocking chair. No luck or too pricey. Then found this beauty! Easy to move around, perfect height, easy to blow up without the pump. And it is waterproof. Sprinklers and rain roll right off it. In the New Mexico sun all day and so far no fading. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint Patty

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my patio set. I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: TCR

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to set up. Haven't had it outside long enough to know if the fabric will fad or not. Love the color, goes really well with my new outside rug.
customer_reviews.author: Phontalas

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight so you will have to secure it or bring it in, if it’s windy. Other than that, it’s attractive, comfortable and overall a nice find. Works out well as extra seating
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece to complete any patio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my patio as foot stools and extra seating if needed. They are so cute and turned out to be one of my favorite pieces for the patio! They take a while to inflate, I used an air mattress pump. Once filled they seem to be holding the air fine. Super cute, affordable addition to any space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy inflatable stool
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Nice and sturdy inflatable stool. And the fabric is also of good quality so cute would buy another. In fact probably a few. Love it
customer_reviews.author: A. Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for a glampling tent contest the blue and green went perfectly with our tent colors. Quality was really good and would not hesitate to use these on a patio or sun room. Will order two more for next camping season.
customer_reviews.author: NYNY LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ottoman for my porch. It’s really cute and easy to move from one place to the other. It has a neat little handle on the side to carry around. I purchased the lemon yellow one. It looks great with my navy Adirondack chairs. Just make sure to bring it in the house if it gets a little windy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great height. Love the fabric. Will need to refill with air about once a week to maintain desired fullness
customer_reviews.author: Gbhoward

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to enjoy, just a few minutes to inflate the first time
customer_reviews.author: D. Docherty

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: What a neat idea. Inflatable ottoman! Love the striped cover. Sturdy, easy to launder. It's just the right height for inside and outside chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. de Boer

customer_reviews.title: Moveable ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! Great addition for propping feet. I use mine poolside.
customer_reviews.author: janice williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, easy, soft n light
customer_reviews.text: Soft and light to move, just light weight for outside to keep out. Good height and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my pool shelf! Sitting in my pool adirondacks, my legs are short and dangle...so this make sitting much more comfy! About to order a second! As non-vertically challenged peeps love it also!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fusilier

customer_reviews.title: Regretted purchase
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to inflate quickly either leaked out or sprung a leak and deflated. The cover was beautiful and sturdy but inflatable inside not so much
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great easy clean item! Helpful to insert the inflatable portion before putting the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Amy June

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great size and so colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this!! I use it on my side patio and its so colorful and comfy to relax on!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Havlick

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport as I take it to the garage when rain is expected. Perhaps it would be fine left outside but it’s super lightweight. Adds color and style to the backyard while providing the functionality needed. Love propping up my feet when relaxing in one of my Adirondack chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality & good colors
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I used a freezer bag with sand to add weight to the base.
customer_reviews.author: JennD - librarian

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need. Use as an accent piece for my outdoor seating area and it complimentary to my lanai furniture. Practical too! Perfect footstool height.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the patio!
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest footstool. Love the fabric. Easy to inflate and put cover on. Seams very sturdy, even when sitting on it. Just do not inflate all the way. Had to let some air out to get cover on. We like it so much we ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Cataldi

customer_reviews.title: Customer review
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute product it looks nice when you blow it up but it's not that sturdy it blew off my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for comfort while we camp. It made all the difference in the world. We just throw it in the camper when we leave. It’s light and very portable. And very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s easy to use, clean and easy to put away when not needed. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata Matejczuk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! If my backyard was bigger i’d buy two! Super easy to blow up and get the cover on, the cover, you can tell is made out of quality outdoor material; and even the plastic i blew up felt extra thick from what i was expecting. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Travel Trailer!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, Perfect size, super sturdy, we use it for the outside setup in our travel trailer, I will be buying more for sure!!! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was fine until about a week ago
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a couple months and it must have a hole in it because it won't hold air. It was fine until about a week ago. Ugh! I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie B

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you sit on them or you use as a foot stool, these are FABULOUS!!!!! Bought two of them and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves them
customer_reviews.text: Great, well made product. You can take it off and wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Josenhans

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty material
customer_reviews.text: Great little stools. Order two, one had a leak, wrote company and they sent a new one promptly and it held the air great! Would order again. Material is high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy,  colorful and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Be careful zipping. I went to quickly and ripped the fabric on the bottom. A large deck calls for lots of coordination. I have 3 in red and 1 in blue + pillows. Light weight and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet.  But seems very sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the ottoman yet. But seems sturdy and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s sturdy yet soft. Firm yet comfy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Cox

customer_reviews.title: but I like the color and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: $25 might be a bit much for this inflatable ottoman, but I like the color and ease of use. I would probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: ... package didn't come with the pump but we really like the Ottomans
customer_reviews.text: My package didn't come with the pump but we really like the Ottomans, only on second day of use so far but very comfy and very pretty. Perfect height too
customer_reviews.author: LauraSvet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is supposed to be for outdoors, but it's so beautiful and well made I want to keep it inside instead!!!! Buy it you will love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but deflates
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute, but it doesn't stay inflated. I would live to just replace the center piece but there isn't an option for that, only a full return and I can't figure out how to contact anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Great for sitting on as well as for feet resting
customer_reviews.author: Zae’s & Liz Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this ottoman! I use it all over the house!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen DiGiacomo

customer_reviews.title: A just right footstool
customer_reviews.text: A footstool that is just the right height, lightweight and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Moser

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the fabric and the foot rest
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fabric and the foot rest. But, I was hoping the red was red red and it was more burgundy for that reason I returned them because they didn’t go with the chairs that i bought them to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect outdoor ottoman! Easy to set up and looks great outside and doesn’t get dirty easily and it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Justine N.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant, bright, beautiful color! Exactly what I expected and easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kay

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: I like that the covers are washable and ready to remove. Assembly was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and lightweight !
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it! Extremely well made, beautiful fabric-lightweight, easy to move around- perfect for porch as well as indoors
customer_reviews.author: jmalu

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant yet cautiously optimistic mainly because of the price but I am so very pleased with the quality and look They’re awesome
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: good while it last but popped after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Genius! And looks more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. It looks great, easy to wash and it’s basically waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna J.A

customer_reviews.title: If you have minimal storage this is for you! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ottoman for my mom to elevate her legs when she is sitting on her deck. She loves it! As do I. It was so easy to inflate, and storage is going to be great. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, look perfect in my patio and excelent material
customer_reviews.author: GL.

customer_reviews.title: Deflates
customer_reviews.text: Only had It a month, minimal use, deflates every time
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Finishing touch.
customer_reviews.text: For the price listed the product was worth it. Would be nice if they had an easier way to pump the air into the foot rest, but for the most part it wasn't difficult to get it all set up. My kids love it the most.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Willits

customer_reviews.title: Great seats
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these I ordered three of them . So far they are holding up fantastically
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it kept air...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t keep air well...bummer because I love everything else about it!
customer_reviews.author: Cori Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Understand the limitations.
customer_reviews.text: We love these. The colors were crisp and bright. Great little foot ottomans. Just remember...they are not made to sit on. They will pop. If you want sturdy...buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Melton

product_meta.title: FBTS Prime Outdoor Inflatable Ottoman Blue Round 21x9 Inch Patio Foot Stools and Ottomans Portable Travel Footstool Used for Outdoor Camping Home Yoga Foot Rest
feature_bullets: ★PACKAGE INCLUDED - 1 x outdoor inflatable ottoman + 1 x Filling, color: blue, size: 21x9 inch. Gift-wrapping package with handle bag. NOTE TO CUSTOMERS - The package does not include inflator, please purchase it by yourself.

★FADING PROTECTION AND WATER RESISTANT - Unique pattern offers house a lovely seat and decoration. FBTS Prime outdoor foot stools and ottomans external fabric uses spun polyester, removable, fade-resistant and water-resistant, color fastness to sunlight 500 hours.

★EASY TO CARRY - FBTS Prime outdoor footstool is very practical and easy to carry, special design with double string piping and handle, zipper on the bottom of the ottoman, folded design for easy portable, solid and durable. Relax and rest on the long journey, ideal for travel, home, outdoor foot rest.

★CUTE DESIGN – Our outdoor ottoman size is 9 inch Height 21 inch diameter, more stable. 300 pounds of the items can be placed on it, Durable reinforced bottom makes it perfect for relaxing outside on your patio or indoor.

★IDEAL GIFT - Fashionable colors and printed fabric providing real life like appearance, as a great party prize, accessory, or even just around the house. The outdoor pouf ottoman is perfect for resting your feet when sitting on the porch, also fascinating decoration for patio and garden. Other products of the same material and pattern included outdoor pillows (ASIN: B01NCS8COH) and chair cushions (ASIN: B01MT5UDSW)
